history.content:
I'm currently choosing between these two classes. While I don't necessarily mind the higher rigor of 189, I feel like I'm doing a lot of stuff that I won't ever end up using/doing. Like doing all this proof/math stuff isn't that useful right? I understand that knowing how an algorithm works is necessary to be able to decide which ML model/methodology to use for what scenario, but I feel like IEOR 142 provides enough to do this on the job as a data scientist. (I don't want to go to grad school for ML). 

Will IEOR 142 under prepare me for a job as a data scientist?


For reference, I've taken data 100, data 144, and prob 140 already. 

Does anyone have any input on this? Thanks!
history.subject: usefulness of cs 189 vs ieor 142?
